alert.note: Alert for Curry County Coast; Eastern Curry County and Josephine County; South Central Oregon Coast (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Medford (Southwest Oregon and Northern California)
info.headline: Flood Watch issued January 12 at 2:45AM PST until January 14 at 4:00AM PST by NWS Medford
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING THROUGH LATE SATURDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is possible. * WHERE...A portion of southwest Oregon, including the following areas, Curry County Coast, Eastern Curry County and Josephine County and South Central Oregon Coast. * WHEN...From this evening through late Saturday night. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. Low-water crossings may be flooded. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be alert for possible Flood Warnings. Those living in areas prone to flooding should be prepared to take action should flooding develop.

area.areaDesc: Curry County Coast; Eastern Curry County and Josephine County; South Central Oregon Coast
